items.text: punches this down to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: works this indrifter towards long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, 1 run

items.text: a wicket against the run of play, and this is a vital scalp. Rubel is pumped up and why not. Delivers a length knuckleball which Rovman looks to heave across the line, but ends up getting a thick inside edge onto the stumps. Century stand broken.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, OUT

dismissal.text: R Powell  b Rubel Hossain 44 (67b 4x4 0x6) SR: 65.67

items.text: stands tall and punches this length ball to mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Holder, no run

items.text: off a thick inside edge to fine leg.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Holder, 1 run

items.text: deep midwicket has made a right royal mess. Shakib the culprit. This was muscled away, he was backtracking, set himself up well by moving across, but just couldn't catch this on the reverse cup. What's worse? This burst right through his hands.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, SIX runs

items.text: full on leg stump, bunted to the leg side, looks like there was no bat, Legbye given. Bangladesh reviewed this in the hope of trapping him lbw. On-field call: not out. Replays show the ball pitched outside leg , so doesn't matter where it would have hit.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 leg bye

items.text: punches to cover.
items.postText: Adnan Nizhum: "Shimron Hetmyer - mark this name. This kid is just better then awesome."
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Holder, no run

items.text: pushes through quicker across the left-hander, Hetmyer opens up the off side and then belts this over cover. Top sthot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, FOUR runs

items.text: cut away to deep cover as they jog a single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: clobbered into the sightscreen. Right into his swinging arc and Holder took full toll of that. Superb
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Holder, SIX runs

items.text: this time gone. Got too carried away as he stepped out to mow this across the line, missed it completely. Smart stumping, Mushfiqur stayed low, gathered the ball cleanly and was balanced well as he whipped the bails out
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Holder, OUT

dismissal.text: JO Holder st †Mushfiqur Rahim b Shakib Al Hasan 7 (5b 0x4 1x6) SR: 140.00

items.text: fired full, blocked.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Nurse, no run

items.text: bunts this into the off side from the crease.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Nurse, no run

items.text: off the back pad as this lobs towards the keeper
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 leg bye

items.text: slash and a miss. Looked to force this through cover point, beaten.

items.text: gentle dab towards square third man

items.text: yorker that tails away, squeezed towards midwicket, good running.

items.text: stands tall and works this off his hip towards the man coming in from deep midwicket. Superb running again.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.text: eased down to long-on

items.text: direct hit from point, there's a run out appeal, but he's just in.

items.text: full toss, thick outside edge to square third man
